resources.string: This is home page of this app.Click on the variety of music you want to hear.It will take us to respective activities.Also contain payment and settings button.
Aah ko chahiye ek umr asar hote tak
Aap jin ke qarib hote hain
The songs will play when you click on them

PAYMENT ACTIVITY\n\nWe can add a Pay with PayPal button to an Android app by using the PayPal Mobile Payment Libraries (MPL).It will enable one touch and secure payment infrastructure to your app.After payment control will be back to the app
ALL_ACTIVITY\n\nThis activity display music of all genre.Buttons are there to move to different activities.Music will be played when You click on them

SUFI ACTIVITY

This activity contains all famous sufi music.Clicking on particular music plays the music.
We can use MediaPlyer APIs to play music which consists of MediaPlayer class.With the help of this we can play music from local resources as well as via online streaming
GAZAL ACTIVITY\n\nIt contains famous gazals,clicking on them plays the paricular music.There are buttons to navigate to different activities without going back to home page

POP ACTIVITY

This activity contains pop music.You can play them by clicking on them.Buttons to navigate other activities
We can also add feature to share music with help of inline intents
